verses.name: Ezekiel 37:13
verses.text: And ye shall know that I am the Lord, when I have opened your graves, O my people, and brought you up out of your graves,

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:14
verses.text: And shall put my spirit in you, and ye shall live, and I shall place you in your own land: then shall ye know that I the Lord have spoken it, and performed it, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:15
verses.text: The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,
